channel.title: macOS on mLogger

item.title: Homebrew
item.description: Homebrew. The Missing Package Manager for macOS (or Linux). Install 1 /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh)" Paste that in a macOS Terminal or Linux shell prompt.
